name: Garegin Nzhdeh
subtitle: Military and political figure
bio: Garegin Ter-Arutyunyan (Nzhdeh) â€” a leader of the national liberation movement, commander and ideologist. Headed the defense of Syunik and was the author of the Tseghakron doctrine.

name: Drastamat Kanayan (Dro)
subtitle: Military leader
bio: Drastamat Kanayan, known as Dro, was one of the leaders of Armenian armed forces in the early 20th century and a participant in the Battle of Sardarapat.

name: Monte Melkonian
subtitle: Commander, National Hero of Armenia
bio: Monte Melkonian was a field commander who played a key role in several operations in the 1990s. He was posthumously awarded the title of National Hero of Armenia.
